channel.title: [317] Need Help Fixing an error
channel.description:
Hey, i tried adding a NPC shop to my 317 server, it didnt work. compiler was all good, and i tried to run the server and i get this error, when i login to client its just a black screen.
Error fixed thanks to I vain I, need to know how to edit prices of my shop, PvP stuff is worth 500 gp along with spirit shields.
OR IF U CAN HELP ME MAKE A PKP SHOP PLEASE DO SO ^^
If u can help, please post / add my msn,
Also if u can help me add a shop to it, add my msn
Amreetitssteve@hotmail.com
I gotta go for a lil, wont be on MSN, but Post please!

item.title: [317] Need Help Fixing an error
item.dc:creator: @Plewz Plewz
item.description:
@Plewz wrote:

You can find tutorials on donator points, look around.

Starter area = Player.java

Just search:

toX

Under it you should see toY and there will be coords, replace with where ever you want your area to be.

Alters = client.java

Search for:

makeGlobalObject

And you should see a bunch of them. Copy and paste one and stick the lunar and ancient alter ID’s in there. Atm I don’t know the ID’s I’m sorry :(. But, the first 2 numbers are X,Y, last number is the ID of the object.

Read full topic
